tool_description:
The FraudLabs Credit Card Fraud Detection Web Service allows instant detection of fraudulent online credit card order transactions which helps internet retailers to avoid loss of revenue, waste of productivity and increase of operation costs in chargebacks or refunds.

Sign up for free license key at http://www.fraudlabs.com/freelicense.aspx?PackageID=1 which allows up to 90 queries a month.
name: Fraudlabs
title: Fraudlabs

api_list.name: FraudLabs API

required_parameters.name: IP
required_parameters.description: IP address where order originated from.

optional_parameters.name: BIN
optional_parameters.description: First 6 digits of credit card number to identify issuing bank.

optional_parameters.name: BINNAME
optional_parameters.description: Name of the bank which issued the credit card.

optional_parameters.name: BINPHONE
optional_parameters.description: Customer service phone number listed on back of credit card.

optional_parameters.name: SHIPADDR
optional_parameters.description: Address of shipping address if different than billing address.

optional_parameters.name: SHIPCITY
optional_parameters.description: City of shipping address if different than billing address.

optional_parameters.name: SHIPREGION
optional_parameters.description: Region of shipping address if different than billing address.

optional_parameters.name: SHIPPOSTAL
optional_parameters.description: Postal/Zip code of shipping address if different than billing address.

optional_parameters.name: SHIPCOUNTRY
optional_parameters.description: Country of shipping address if different than billing address.

optional_parameters.name: QUERYID
optional_parameters.description: Additional information to identify this transaction.
